dcterms:creator: P. Warden
dcterms:description: The Speech Commands corpus contains 105,829 utterances recorded from 2,618 speakers, featuring 35 commands including twenty trigger words. It includes words that sound similar to core words, adding challenges for classification models, and the recording environment varies in quality to mimic real-world conditions.
dcterms:title: Speech Commands corpus v0.02

dcterms:creator: K. Ito
dcterms:description: The LJSpeech corpus is a dataset designed for text-to-speech synthesis, containing 13,100 short audio clips of a single speaker reading passages from books. It is widely used for training and evaluating speech synthesis systems.
dcterms:title: LJSpeech corpus
